definitions.text: an exchange of ideas via conversation
examples: let's have more work and less talk around here

definitions.text: discussion; (`talk about' is a less formal alternative for `discussion of')
examples: his poetry contains much talk about love and anger

definitions.text: the act of giving a talk to an audience
examples: I attended an interesting talk on local history

definitions.text: a speech that is open to the public
examples: he attended a lecture on telecommunications
there has been talk about you lately
She talks a lot of nonsense
This depressed patient does not verbalize
If you don't oblige me, I'll talk!
The former employee spilled all the details

synonyms: let the cat out of the bag

examples: She will talk at Rutgers next week
Did you ever lecture at Harvard?
